Posts.Content: I'm new to the forum, but have read many posts from BC survivors, including yours and many who have responded to you. Your post really hit me hard. My mother died in a head on collision 4 yrs ago down from my kids high school (she was picking them up). I hope the family is able to find reasons and get closure for this. The mental trauma can last years, if not a lifetime. I don't know if the forum has pm, but if it does, feel free to write. I will and have prayed for you and the family... Angelisa
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!
